title: Evaluating Induced CCG Parsers on Grounded Semantic Parsing
abstract: We compare the effectiveness of four different syntactic CCG parsers for a semantic slot-filling task to explore how much syntactic supervision is required for downstream semantic analysis. This extrinsic, task-based evaluation also provides a unique window into the semantics captured (or missed) by unsupervised grammar induction systems.
histories: EMNLP 2016, Table 2 erratum, Code and Freebase Semantic Parsing data URL
